japanese: 隼人のツープラトン技/!c03『熱血気合砲』!c07を覚えた！
english: Learned Hayato's Two-Platoon technique /!c03'Hot-Blooded Spirit Cannon'!c07!

japanese: 雹クンって、/今年も生徒会長なの？
english: Hail-kun, /student council president again?

japanese: 響子のツープラトン技/!c03『究極の矯正術』!c07を覚えた！
english: Learned Kyoko's Two-Platoon technique /!c03'Ultimate Correction'!c07!

japanese: 金魚すくい/水泳部員と競泳/プールサイドで喫茶店
english: Goldfish scooping/ Race swim club members/ Cafe by pool

japanese: 雹さんって、/今年も生徒会長なんですか？
english: Hail-san, /student council president again?

japanese: 雹クン……/学園祭の間も/剣を持って歩いてるの？
english: Hail-kun... /even during the festival, /walking with a sword?

japanese: 霧嶋家の人間は皆、/ある組織から与えられた任務を/全うするためだけの存在。
english: All Kirishima family members /exist only to fulfill /missions from an organization.

japanese: 響子を誘う/頑張れと励ます/英雄を誘うように勧める
english: Invite Kyoko/ Encourage/ Suggest inviting Eiyu

japanese: 隼人先生みたいに、/生徒と正面から組み合えるような/熱血教師になりたいなって。
english: Want to be a hot-blooded teacher /who can face students head-on /like Hayato-sensei.

japanese: 雹から/!c02届け物『密書』!c07をあずかった/!c01生徒会室!c07に届けよう！
english: Received 'Secret Letter' from Hail /deliver to !c01Student Council Room!c07!

japanese: 雹さん……/学園祭の間も/剣を持って歩いてるんですか？
english: Hail-san... /even during the festival, /walking with a sword?

japanese: 風間醍醐の力をいま一度示して、/総番長の名を再び/とどろかせるべきです！
english: Show Kazama Daigo's power once more /and make the boss name /resound again!

japanese: 雹クン……/何か用なの？
english: Hail-kun... /something you need?

japanese: 響子先生。/先生のツープラトン技を教えてください！
english: Kyoko-sensei. /Please teach me your Two-Platoon technique!

japanese: 醍醐先輩も、/学園祭で何かやるんですか？
english: Daigo-senpai, /doing something at the festival?

japanese: 隼人先生！/先生のツープラトン技を/俺に教えて下さい！！
english: Hayato-sensei! /Please teach me your Two-Platoon technique!!

japanese: 隼人先生！/先生のツープラトン技を/私に教えて下さい！！
english: Hayato-sensei! /Please teach me your Two-Platoon technique!!

japanese: 頑張りましょう、!0。/たとえ今、思うような結果を出せなくても、/その努力は、いつかきっと報われます。
english: Let's do our best, !0. /Even if results aren't what you want now, /that effort will be rewarded someday.

japanese: 雹さん……/何か用ですか？
english: Hail-san... /something you need?

japanese: 雹のツープラトン技/!c03『残酷斬』!c07を覚えた！
english: Learned Hail's Two-Platoon technique /!c03'Cruel Slash'!c07!

japanese: 響子先生のメガネを外した顔を/一度見てみたいなぁ。
english: Want to see Kyoko-sensei's face /without glasses once.

japanese: 雹クン！/学園祭は楽しんでる？
english: Hail-kun! /Enjoying the festival?

japanese: 響子先生！/散歩中ですか？
english: Kyoko-sensei! /Taking a walk?

japanese: 醍醐のツープラトン技/!c03『男の中の男』!c07を覚えた！
english: Learned Daigo's Two-Platoon technique /!c03'Man Among Men'!c07!

japanese: 隼人先生……
english: Hayato-sensei...

japanese: 隼人先生……なんですか？
english: Hayato-sensei... what is it?

japanese: 響子先生は、確かに良い女だ。/……そして、英雄先生も/良い男だったって事だ。
english: Kyoko-sensei is a good woman. /...And Eiyu-sensei /was a good man.

japanese: 針ならまだしも、/槍を飲むのはイヤだなぁ。/判ったよ、ティファニー。
english: Needles are fine, but /swallowing spears is bad. /Got it, Tiffany.

japanese: 響子先生……
english: Kyoko-sensei...

japanese: 阻止しますよ、何としてでも。
english: I'll stop it, no matter what.

japanese: 雹さん！/学園祭は楽しんでますか？
english: Hail-san! /Enjoying the festival?

japanese: 雹クン……こんなところで/何を眺めてるの？
english: Hail-kun... what are you /looking at here?

japanese: 雹クンが気にするほどの理由は、/何もないと思うわよ。
english: I don't think there's reason /for Hail-kun to worry.

japanese: 響子から/!c02届け物『骨格標本』!c07をあずかった/!c01理科室!c07に届けよう！
english: Received 'Skeleton Specimen' from Kyoko /deliver to !c01Science Room!c07!

japanese: 醍醐先輩……。
english: Daigo-senpai...

japanese: 醍醐先輩！/せっかくの学園祭なんだから、/店をのぞいてみませんか？
english: Daigo-senpai! /It's the festival, so /want to check out shops?

japanese: 醍醐先輩！/醍醐先輩のツープラトン技を/俺にも教えてください！
english: Daigo-senpai! /Please teach me your Two-Platoon technique!

japanese: 醍醐先輩！/醍醐先輩のツープラトン技を/私にも教えてください！
english: Daigo-senpai! /Please teach me your Two-Platoon technique!

japanese: 針ならまだしも、/槍を飲むのはイヤだなぁ。/判ったわよ、ティファニー。
english: Needles are fine, but /swallowing spears is bad. /Got it, Tiffany.

japanese: 阻止するわ。/何としてでもね。
english: I'll stop it, no matter what.

japanese: 雹さん……
english: Hail-san...

japanese: 雹クン……
english: Hail-kun...
